title: 1 Bedroom (SMALL) in Quiet Area! Nice! Available NOW!!
posting_body: ['***', 'If You Are Reading this Ad, THE UNIT IS STILL AVAILABLE.', ' Please Follow Directions.', 'Thanks!', '*', '**', 'Older building with all basic amenities.', 'Small unit, ideal for one person.', 'Very quiet complex filled with professionals.', 'We are looking for the same from the next tenant.', ' Applicant must be upstanding person, currently employed, been on the job 2+ years and meet standard application guidelines.', ' No Pets / No Prior Evictions /', 'No BK.', ' Background Check Performed.', ' PRINCIPALS ONLY!', ' NO THIRD PARTY INQUIRIES.', 'Please Follow Directions', 'At The Bottom to be Considered.', ' .', 'Rent: $1,495.00 .', ' Deposit $1,495.00 .', '  Water / Garbage PAID', 'Fairmont District in San Leandro.', 'Close to all transportation', '* SMALL 1 Bedroom', '* Fresh Paint', '* Clean', '* Quiet', '* Cable Ready', '* Upstairs Unit', '* Off Street Parking', '* By BART / BUS', '* AVAILABLE NOW!', 'For consideration, please email us your background information (where you live now and for how long; why you are moving; how many is this for; where do you work and how long have you been there, contact number etc) and we will follow up with you with more information and instructions to preview and fill out an application if desired.', 'Thanks.']
